text: Ama anazanku'ma huno Polima maka avoma kre'nea avomofoma tagrama antahiama hu'zamo'a amuho hu'ne. Mago'amo'za ana kemofo rempi hu'za ontahi'za, manifatgo nosaza vahe'mo'za, ana nanekea ru agu'agesa rukrehe hu'za neramasamize. Zamagra anahukna hu'za mago'a avontafepi kenena erirukrehe nehu'za, zamagra'a kanazana zamavufare erigonefize.
